title: Gwyneth Paltrow rocks a unique look in black culottes and $1,100 Dior sneakers
text:
She just celebrated her 47th birthday and her first anniversary with Brad Falchuk.

But Gwyneth Paltrow was back in work mode as she headed to Jimmy Kimmel on Wednesday to promote her new Netflix show.

The mother-of-two currently stars in The Politician, opposite Ben Platt, which was written and produced by her husband.

Star: Gwyneth Paltrow left Jimmy Kimmel on Wednesday after appearing to promote her Netflix show, The Politician, in a unique outfit

The Goop founder headed out in a blue collard blouse and black high waisted culottes that hit at her knee.

She paired the unique look with black and white, high-top Dior sneakers that retail for $1,100.

The Seven actress wore her blonde hair down in very loose curls.

Gwyn went for a dark silver smokey eye look with a nude lip and contoured and rosey cheeks.

Smokey: Gwyn went for a dark silver smokey eye look with a nude lip and contoured and rosey cheeks

Expensive footwear: She paired the unique look with black and white, high-top Dior sneakers that retail for $1,100

She wore a black fitness tracker and simple silver rings and bracelets, while carrying a large green plastic bottle on her way out.

Last week she revealed that her second husband had to convince her to get back into acting.

Speaking on Today she said 'I’ve got a pretty big day job over at goop.com, so I sorta put acting on the back burner,' she said. 'But he was writing and he [Brad] was like, ‘I think I’m writing a part for you.’ And I was like, ‘I don’t think I can do a part.’ And lo and behold, here I am.'

Chic: The Goop founder headed out in a blue collard blouse and black high waisted culottes that hit at her knee

Encouragement: Speaking on Today she said 'I’ve got a pretty big day job over at goop.com, so I sorta put acting on the back burner,' she said. 'But he was writing and he [Brad] was like, ‘I think I’m writing a part for you.’ And I was like, ‘I don’t think I can do a part.’ And lo and behold, here I am'

The daughter of Blythe Danner enjoyed the experience working with her spouse.

'It was the best. It was really easy,' she said. 'I think when you trust someone so much and you love someone so much, and they know you so well and you know them, it’s really an interesting set of characteristics to bring to a workplace. So it was really nice.'

The satirical Ryan Murphy show follows Payton Hobart who is an ambitious high Tschool student during his run for class president, all while aiming for the White House one day.

In the show, Gwyneth plays his mother Georgina, a Washington Post review described her as 'the star' of the show.

The show has already been renewed for a second season.
description: Gwyneth Paltrow was back in work mode as she headed to Jimmy Kimmel on Wednesday to promote her new Netflix show. The mother-of-two currently stars in The Politician, opposite Ben Platt.
